summary: Backend API testing completed for SonicForge Phases 4, 5, 6. All 43 tests passed (100% success rate). Tested authentication, voting, recommendations, social sharing, subscriptions, analytics, A/B testing, dashboard, and health checks.

minor.issue: Redis not connected (expected in dev environment)
S3 buckets not accessible (expected in dev environment)

critical_code_review_comments: In-memory storage used for all services (users, votes, subscriptions, analytics) - appropriate for MVP/testing but should use persistent storage (Redis/MongoDB) for production
Password validation works correctly, rejecting weak passwords
RBAC properly implemented - regular users denied access to admin/moderator endpoints (experiments list, dashboard)
JWT authentication flow working correctly with access/refresh tokens
A/B testing framework initialized with default experiments (ui_theme_v1, pricing_v1, onboarding_v1)
seed_data_creation: Test users created dynamically during tests with unique UUIDs
context_for_next_testing_agent: All Phase 4/5/6 backend APIs are working correctly. Test file at /app/backend/tests/test_sonicforge_api.py covers: health checks, auth (register/login/refresh/logout/me), voting (submit/get/top-tracks), recommendations (trending/personalized/similar/genre/listen), social sharing (create/get URLs/get track), subscriptions (plans/credits/status/can-generate), analytics (track event/public stats/prometheus), A/B testing (list/variant/convert/results), dashboard (widgets/system/business metrics). Admin endpoints require @sonicforge.ai email domain for admin role assignment.
